title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 175-4.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 175-4.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Subpart shall apply to juvenile
offenders committed to the custody of the Division for Youth who are 16 years
of age or older. A juvenile offender, 16 years of age or older, may be
transferred from the custody of the Division for Youth to the custody of the

Department of Correctional Services when there is no substantial likelihood
that the juvenile offender will benefit from the programs offered by division
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
175-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
